title: BRIEF-Husky Receives Approval To Begin Superior Refinery Rebuild
text:
BRIEF-Husky Receives Approval To Begin Superior Refinery Rebuild

Stock Markets 13 minutes ago (Sep 30, 2019 07:20)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Husky Receives Approval To Begin Superior Refinery Rebuild Sept 30 (Reuters) - Husky Energy Inc : * HUSKY RECEIVES APPROVAL TO BEGIN SUPERIOR REFINERY REBUILD * HUSKY ENERGY INC - RECEIVED REQUIRED PERMIT APPROVALS TO BEGIN RECONSTRUCTION ACTIVITIES AT SITE AND WORK IS EXPECTED TO BEGIN IMMEDIATELY * HUSKY ENERGY INC - ONCE REFINERY IS FULLY RAMPED UP, HUSKY'S OVERALL DOWNSTREAM THROUGHPUT CAPACITY IS EXPECTED TO BE APPROXIMATELY 400,000 BBLS/DAY. * HUSKY ENERGY INC - REBUILD OF REFINERY WILL TAKE PLACE OVER NEXT TWO YEARS WITH AN EXPECTED RETURN TO FULL OPERATIONS IN 2021

BRIEF-Husky Receives Approval To Begin Superior Refinery Rebuild
description: BRIEF-Husky Receives Approval To Begin Superior Refinery Rebuild
